actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution urging continuation of tax deductibility of residential mortgage interest payments.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the administration should honor the basic Federal obligation to promote affordable and decent housing by retaining the current home mortgage interest deduction as an essential component of an equitable tax system intended to promote national living standards.

titles.title: A resolution urging continuation of tax deductibility of residential mortgage interest payments.
